
The `TextLayer` renders text labels on the map using texture mapping.

```{r text-layer, eval = FALSE}
```
See also [deckgl-api-reference-text-layer](https://deck.gl/#/documentation/deckgl-api-reference/layers/text-layer)
